name: OnlyMeat
ruleText: There shall be no other food than meat.

name: WorshipCats
ruleText: Cats are holy and you shall not harm them.

name: WorshipShadow
ruleText: Sunlight is harmful and you must avoid it.

name: AnimalLover
ruleText: All animals are equal and must be protected.

name: Farmer
ruleText: You shall use the flora and fauna for your needs.

name: OnlyFruits
ruleText: There shall be no other food than fruits - protect all living creatures.

name: Rogue
ruleText: If you are in need you shall take from the others.

name: WorshipFish
ruleText: Fish are holy and you shall not harm them.

name: Shaman
ruleText: You shall use all fruits of nature for your magic to improve the living standards.

name: WorshipSunlight
ruleText: Sunlight is the root of everything. Everybody shall bathe in it as much as possible.
